text: Autodromo Nazionale Monza is a motorsport race track. It is near the town of Monza, Italy, north of Milan. It is one of the oldest motor racing tracks in the world. It was built in 1922, and has been used for the Italian Grand Prix almost every year since. Category:Sport in Italy Category:Formula One circuits Category:Monza Category:1922 establishments in Italy
title: Autodromo Nazionale Monza
